LanguageData.RottyMilden.label: Rotty Milden
LanguageData.RottyMilden.description: Rotty Milden is a country girl who loves playing pranks. Most of her mischief is harmless and will keep you on your toes, but occasionally she'll leave behind a big mess. Regardless, it's all fun and games to her.\n\nShe'll make sure small, random events occur frequently, while holding back on larger calamities.
